response.overview: Don't miss out on a brand new full comedy special from the Short King himself, Drew Lynch, who stole the hearts of audiences all over the world with his golden buzzer performance on America's Got Talent. From his comedy stomping grounds of navigating life with a stutter, Drew talks about marrying someone with ADHD, how sexuality is a spectrum (from wolf to otter), and how growing doesn't always mean up. The Short King is here with some fresh stand-up for all to enjoy!
response.title: Drew Lynch: Short King
